comments:
Build id: I20060427-0800

1) Help > Search for new features to Install
2) Selected Eclipse I-build update site (in my case http://fullmoon.ottawa.ibm.com/eclipse/testUpdates/).
3) Select all
4) Finish.

Dialog: "An internal error has occurred."
